question.title: Struts 7.0.0 404 error with Tomcat 10.1.34 (using Java 17)
question.body:
I am learning about Struts 7.0.0 using Tomcat 10.1.34 by following this javabrains tutorial. The server starts without any exceptions and I believe I have configured the files correctly. But, I am receiving 404 error when accessing the URL: http://localhost:8080/struts2_starter_war/getTutorial.action.

Following are my configs:

POM.xml

<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
         xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>

    <groupId>in.my.site</groupId>
    <artifactId>struts2-starter</artifactId>
    <version>1.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
    <packaging>war</packaging>

    <name>struts2-starter</name>
    <url>http://maven.apache.org</url>

    <properties>
        <project.build.sourceEncoding>UTF-8</project.build.sourceEncoding>
        <maven.compiler.source>17</maven.compiler.source>
        <maven.compiler.target>17</maven.compiler.target>
    </properties>

    <dependencies>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>jakarta.enterprise</groupId>
            <artifactId>jakarta.enterprise.cdi-api</artifactId>
            <version>4.1.0</version>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>jakarta.enterprise</groupId>
            <artifactId>jakarta.enterprise.cdi-el-api</artifactId>
            <version>4.1.0</version>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>com.fasterxml.jackson.dataformat</groupId>
            <artifactId>jackson-dataformat-xml</artifactId>
            <version>2.10.1</version>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>junit</groupId>
            <artifactId>junit</artifactId>
            <version>3.8.1</version>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>
    </dependencies>
</project>

struts.xml inside src/main/in/my/site/struts2 folder:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE struts PUBLIC
    "-//Apache Software Foundation//DTD Struts Configuration 2.3//EN"
    "http://struts.apache.org/dtds/struts-2.3.dtd">
<struts>
    <package name="default" extends="struts-default">
        <action name="getTutorial" class="in.my.site.struts2.actions.TutorialAction">
            <result name="success">/success.jsp</result>
            <result name="failure">/error.jsp</result>
        </action>
    </package>
</struts>

TutorialAction class:

package in.my.site.struts2.actions;

public class TutorialAction {

    public String execute() {
        System.out.println("In execute method");
        return "success";
    }

}

I am new to Struts and I have spent a lot of time trying to spot the error. Anything else that I should be configuring?

EDIT: Although artifact is getting deployed (and the index.jsp being accessible), I am getting below error:

ERROR CdiObjectFactory [findBeanManager]: Could not find BeanManager instance for any given JNDI key, giving up
ERROR CdiObjectFactory Struts2 CDI integration could not be initialized.
[2025-01-26 09:50:51,996] Artifact struts2-starter:war exploded: Artifact is deployed successfully
[2025-01-26 09:50:51,996] Artifact struts2-starter:war exploded: Deploy took 3,704 milliseconds

Can above error be an issue? (I followed the answert at https://stackoverflow.com/a/19003725/4233030, but didn't work)
